Leica Microsystems

The world leader in microscopes and scientific instruments

Browse Categories

Product Categories

We see a way to reduce over 60% of manual process steps through system intelligence during advanced imaging workflows

By pushing the limits of resolution, speed, and ease of use, Leica Microsystems enables scientists to gain new INSIGHTS beyond what has been possible and visible before. This advances scientific discovery and understanding to protect our health.

Microscopes

Shop DMi-1 Bundles

More than a highly automated microscope, Mica unites widefield and confocal imaging in a sample protecting, incubating environment. With the simple push of a button, you have everything you need - all in one place - to supercharge fluorescence imaging workflows and get meaningful scientific results faster.

Learn More

Leica – From Eye to Insight

Leica Microsystems is passionate about driving innovation in visualization and analysis. Partnering with customers, enabling them to make informed decisions and optimize their workflows.
